Ingredients.4: 1 (5.5 ounce) package spicy seasoning coating mix

Directions.1: Slice peppers lengthwise, remove seeds and core; fill with cheese.

Directions.2: Roll out sausage with rolling pin, between two layers of plastic wrap. Remove plastic from sausage, and wrap a thin coating of sausage around each jalapeno.

Directions.3: Roll peppers in spicy seasoned coating mix.

Directions.4: Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 15 to 25 minutes or until brown and sizzling and cheese is melted.
